params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.key
params.description: A unique key for this atom. Must be specified when using advanced mapping.

params.name: data.inputs
params.description: List of Input.keys identifying files that should be used in this atom. The listed inputs must have the same timeline.

params.name: data.end_time_offset
params.description: End time in seconds for the atom, relative to the input file timeline. When end_time_offset is not specified, the inputs are used until the end of the atom.

params.name: data.start_time_offset
params.description: Start time in seconds for the atom, relative to the input file timeline. The default is 0s.
